meanings.definition: A substance used for sticking objects together.
meanings.sent1: I used glue to fix my broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The glue dried quickly on the paper.
meanings.sent3: The glue made the puzzle pieces stick together like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the glue that held the team together.
meanings.sent5: The glue smelled strong but worked wonders on the project.

meanings.definition: To join or attach with glue.
meanings.sent1: I will glue the pieces back together.
meanings.sent2: She carefully glued the handle onto the cup.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally glued his fingers together while crafting.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was glued by shared memories.
meanings.sent5: The artist glued colorful beads onto the canvas for a unique effect.
